interventions.title: Community Walking Programs
interventions.description: Organize guided walks and designate safe walking routes in partnership with community centers. These programs create social support networks while increasing physical activity levels in a structured, accessible format.
activities: Establish regular walking groups with trained leaders
Map safe walking routes throughout the community
Partner with community centers for indoor alternatives
interventions.outcomes: 25% increase in physical activity participation, 70% participant retention

interventions.title: Diabetes Self-Management Education Programs
interventions.description: Structured education programs that teach people with diabetes how to manage their condition through proper diet, exercise, medication management, and blood glucose monitoring.
interventions.outcomes: 0.8% reduction in A1C levels, improved self-care behaviors

interventions.title: Community Gardens Initiative
interventions.description: Establish community gardens that provide fresh produce access while teaching nutrition and cooking skills. Creates food security and builds community connections around healthy eating.
activities: Establish garden plots in community spaces
Host community harvest and cooking events
interventions.outcomes: 40% increase in fruit/vegetable consumption, improved food security

interventions.title: Workplace Wellness Programs
interventions.description: Comprehensive workplace programs that promote healthy behaviors through policy changes, environmental modifications, and employee education initiatives.
activities: Create fitness facilities or gym partnerships
Offer healthy food options in cafeterias
interventions.outcomes: 15% reduction in healthcare costs, improved employee health metrics

interventions.title: Mobile Health Clinics
interventions.description: Deploy mobile health units to provide basic healthcare services, screenings, and health education in underserved areas with limited healthcare access.
activities: Regular mobile clinic schedules in target areas
interventions.outcomes: 60% increase in preventive care utilization, earlier disease detection

interventions.title: Smoking Cessation Support Groups
interventions.description: Structured group-based smoking cessation programs that combine behavioral support, peer encouragement, and access to cessation aids.
interventions.outcomes: 30% quit rate at 6 months, reduced cardiovascular risk

interventions.title: School-Based Nutrition Education
interventions.description: Comprehensive nutrition education programs in schools that teach healthy eating habits, cooking skills, and promote lifelong wellness behaviors.
interventions.outcomes: Improved dietary knowledge, healthier food choices, reduced BMI

interventions.title: Community Health Worker Programs
interventions.description: Train and deploy community health workers to provide culturally appropriate health education, support, and navigation services to community members with chronic conditions.
activities: Train community members as health workers
Conduct home visits and community outreach
interventions.outcomes: Improved medication adherence, reduced hospitalizations, better disease management

interventions.title: Built Environment Improvements
interventions.description: Implement infrastructure changes that promote physical activity, such as sidewalks, bike lanes, parks, and safe pedestrian crossings.
activities: Install or improve sidewalks and crosswalks
Improve street lighting and safety features
interventions.outcomes: Increased walking and biking, reduced injury rates, improved community health

interventions.title: Healthy Food Retail Initiatives
interventions.description: Work with local retailers to increase availability and affordability of healthy foods in underserved communities through incentives and policy changes.
activities: Partner with corner stores and small markets
Provide incentives for stocking healthy foods
Support farmers markets and mobile markets
interventions.outcomes: Increased healthy food access, improved dietary patterns in community

interventions.title: Diabetes Wellness Advocates Program
interventions.target_population: Diabetic patients in River Region of Alabama
interventions.description: Training program that prepared diabetes wellness advocates to help diabetics set wellness goals and manage their condition. The program focused on personalized support and condition management strategies.
interventions.outcomes: 50% decrease in emergency room visits among participants (2004-2007)

interventions.title: Smoke-Free Food Establishments Initiative
interventions.target_population: Jefferson County, AL food establishments and patrons
interventions.description: Two-phase program to encourage smoke-free food establishments through initial rewards followed by inspection penalties. Program included recognition plaques and enforcement through food inspection scoring.
interventions.outcomes: Increased smoke-free establishments from 65.4% to 97%

interventions.title: Alaska 10,000 Steps Walking Program
interventions.description: Free walking program implemented through Central Peninsula General Hospital. Participants were given step counters and committed to walking 10,000 steps daily while tracking various health metrics.
interventions.outcomes: 304,336,058 total steps walked, 766 pounds group weight loss, 62% of participants exercising 30+ minutes 3x weekly
interventions.source: Alaska Department of Health & Social Services

interventions.title: Alaska Comprehensive Tobacco Control Program
interventions.description: Multi-component tobacco control program based on CDC best practices. Program included countermarketing, community programs, youth initiatives, and cessation services including a free quitline.
interventions.outcomes: 40% quit rate via quitline, 21.5% reduction in adult smokers since 1996, estimated $300M in averted medical costs
interventions.source: Alaska Department of Health and Social Services

interventions.title: River Region Diabetes Management Program
interventions.description: Trained diabetes wellness advocates to help diabetics set wellness goals and manage their condition
outcomes: 50% decrease in emergency room visits among participants (2004-2007)

interventions.title: Alabama REACH Breast and Cervical Cancer Coalition
interventions.description: Community action plan to increase cancer screenings through outreach and patient navigation

interventions.title: Jefferson County Smoke-Free Restaurants Initiative
interventions.description: Program to encourage smoke-free policies in restaurants through rewards and penalties

interventions.title: Alaska Comprehensive Tobacco Control Program
interventions.description: Multi-component tobacco control program including marketing, community programs, and cessation support
interventions.source: Alaska Department of Health and Social Services

interventions.title: Central Peninsula 10,000 Steps Program
interventions.description: Free walking program with step counting and health monitoring

interventions.title: South LA Fast Food Moratorium
interventions.description: City Council ordinance limiting new fast food restaurants and providing incentives for healthy food retailers in disadvantaged areas
interventions.outcomes: Two new healthy food stores opened

interventions.title: African Americans Building a Legacy of Health Coalition
interventions.description: Multi-component program improving food and physical activity options through policy change and community programs
interventions.outcomes: 70% maintained/increased fruit/vegetable consumption, 60% maintained/increased physical activity, 69% maintained/decreased BMI

interventions.title: California Tobacco Control Program
interventions.description: Comprehensive tobacco control program launched in 1989
interventions.outcomes: 35% reduction in adult smoking (1988-2007), 61% decline in cigarette consumption, accelerated decline in lung cancer rates

interventions.title: Vietnamese REACH for Health Initiative - Cervical Cancer
interventions.description: Multi-component cervical cancer screening program
interventions.outcomes: 47.7% first-time Pap tests, 52.1% repeat tests within 18 months

interventions.title: REACH for Wellness Program
interventions.target_population: African American adults in Atlanta Renewal Community
interventions.description: Program offering free community services to improve cardiovascular health and eliminate health disparities among minorities

interventions.title: Georgia Stroke and Heart Attack Prevention Program
interventions.target_population: Low-income patients with high blood pressure
interventions.description: Intensive monitoring and treatment program providing low/no cost medications and case management
interventions.source: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

interventions.title: Vías Emergency Preparedness Program
interventions.description: Educational program teaching emergency preparedness through promoters
outcomes: Increased awareness of school emergency plans

interventions.title: REACH 2010 Latino Health Project
interventions.description: Diabetes prevention and management program through education and outreach
outcomes: Blood sugar control increased from 20.7% to 43.4%
Flu vaccination rates increased from 44.2% to 55%

interventions.title: Shape Up Somerville
interventions.description: Environmental intervention to prevent childhood obesity through nutrition and physical activity
outcomes: Reduced weight gain by 1 pound over 8 months in children

interventions.title: WorkWell Employee Health Program
interventions.description: Comprehensive workplace wellness program offering health risk assessments, education, training and financial incentives
outcomes: 50% lower obesity rates vs general population

interventions.title: Southern Nevada Online Walking Program
interventions.description: Web-based walking program with virtual tracking and community connections
outcomes: Physical activity guideline compliance increased from 30% to 52.2%

interventions.title: Nutrition Challenge Program
interventions.description: Online nutrition education and fruit/vegetable consumption tracking program

interventions.title: KidPower!
interventions.description: Multi-component program to increase youth physical activity
interventions.source: New Hampshire Department of Health and Human Services

interventions.title: Chautauqua County Tobacco Cessation Program
interventions.setting: Healthcare facilities in Chautauqua County, NY
interventions.description: Hospital policy change to screen patients for tobacco use and provide cessation intervention

interventions.title: Bronx Health REACH Coalition Nutrition Initiative
interventions.description: Community-based program working through churches to improve access to healthy foods
outcomes: Increased healthy food options in stores

interventions.title: NY State Colorectal Cancer Screening Program
interventions.description: State-funded screening program providing colorectal cancer testing and follow-up care

interventions.title: Mission Meltaway
interventions.description: 8-week group weight loss and healthy lifestyle program

interventions.title: Primary Care Quality Improvement Initiative
interventions.description: Quality improvement program based on Chronic Care Model using coordinators, data collection, collaborative learning, and patient self-management support
outcomes: 33% increase in patients meeting diabetes control goals
25% increase in patients meeting cholesterol control goals

interventions.title: Eat Smart, Move More Holiday Challenge
interventions.description: Six-week holiday weight management program providing resources and support to prevent holiday weight gain
interventions.source: NC Department of Health Physical Activity and Nutrition Branch

interventions.title: North Dakota Diabetes Care Quality Program
interventions.target_population: Diabetes patients with Blue Cross Blue Shield
interventions.description: Partnership to track and improve diabetes care quality measures
interventions.source: ND Diabetes Prevention and Control Program & Blue Cross Blue Shield

interventions.title: Campus Walking Program
interventions.description: 12-week structured walking program

interventions.title: H1N1 Emergency Response Coordination
interventions.description: Coordinated emergency response to H1N1 outbreak

interventions.title: Cherokee Nation School Health Initiative
interventions.description: School-based program to reduce tobacco use through policy and environmental changes

interventions.title: Pawtucket Heart Health Program
interventions.description: Mass media campaign and community programs to educate about heart disease
interventions.outcomes: 16% decrease in cardiovascular disease risk after 5 years

interventions.title: Vaccinate Before You Graduate (VBYG)
interventions.description: Free vaccination program for high school seniors
interventions.outcomes: 11,000+ students vaccinated across 79 schools

interventions.title: Women's Cancer Screening Program
interventions.description: Partnership program to increase cancer screening access
interventions.outcomes: 1,800 additional screenings, 11 breast cancers diagnosed

interventions.title: REACH 2010 Charleston and Georgetown Diabetes Coalition
interventions.description: Comprehensive diabetes management and education program
interventions.outcomes: Increased screening rates, 50% decrease in ER visits

interventions.title: Healthy Homes Housing Design
interventions.description: Partnership between Public Health Seattle & King County and Seattle Housing Authority to build environmentally-friendly homes with features reducing asthma triggers
outcomes: 67% reduction in urgent clinical care needs

interventions.title: Children's Health Initiative (CHI)
interventions.description: Program providing healthcare coverage support and care coordination for children
outcomes: 42-257% increase in early oral health visits
Improved family confidence in accessing services

interventions.title: Healthy Homes Asthma Program
interventions.description: Community Health Workers conduct home visits to assess and reduce asthma triggers

interventions.title: Roane County Diabetes Care Quality Improvement
interventions.target_population: Patients with diabetes at Roane County Family Health Care
interventions.description: Partnership between WVU and health center to improve quality of diabetes care through staff education and monitoring
activities: Staff education on chronic disease management
interventions.source: West Virginia University Office of Health Services Research
